metadata.synopsis: Another duergar greets you on the other side of the lake after sailingthere with captain Greymon.Both duergar are surly, but Morghal in particular. She is suspicious of Absolutists, but happy to take their coin. She should be gruff, and absolutely not listless. She tells you that Nere is trapped above.

31.speaker: Corsair Greymon
31.text: Dry land. My guts'll stop churning now.
31.context: CinematicNodeContext: The boat arrives and the captain and players disembark.

32.speaker: Morghal
32.text: Greymon, you shithead - time you showed up. We got trouble.

43.speaker: Corsair Greymon
43.text: Spit it up, Morghal. Or you busy choking on that True Soul Nere's prick with Thrinn?

16.speaker: Morghal
16.text: Drugh no. The twat-Soul caused a rockfall. Trapped tighter than a ring on a fat finger.
16.context: NodeContext: DRUGH NO = FUCK NO. "Droog" like 'good', not 'food'.

25.speaker: Corsair Greymon
25.text: You're shitting me. He pay up?

40.speaker: Morghal
40.text: That's the trouble - he got the gold on him. Thrinn's arm's falling off what with the gnome slaves she been beating.

10.context: CinematicNodeContext: Morghal peers at player and looks them up and down.

17.speaker: Morghal
17.text: Who's the hoon, Greymon - another slave for the dig?

29.speaker: Player
29.text: I am a True Soul. And you will speak with respect.

14.speaker: Player
14.text: I'm here to see the sergeant. I have her boots.

4.speaker: Player
4.text: I was told to report to the sergeant.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Did I hear right? You keep gnomes as slaves?

9.speaker: Corsair Greymon
9.text: Easy to feed, fat thumbs for digging. Won't find none better.

12.speaker: Morghal
12.text: But your type got their uses. Let's get those meat-paws to work.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: I am a True Soul. You will treat me with honour.

36.speaker: Morghal
36.text: Your Twat-Soul chum owes us a load of coin. You want in? Pay the toll.

0.speaker: Morghal
0.text: I call it the True Soul special.
0.context: CinematicNodeContext: Morghal smiles creepily.NodeContext: Morghal smiles creepily.

7.speaker: Player
7.text: Fine - take this. Consider it a goodwill gesture. |XXX gold|

6.speaker: Corsair Greymon
6.text: I'll be shagged to Shanatar. Shit's looking up.

37.speaker: Morghal
37.text: But I'm warning you - that twat-Soul ain't settle up soon, there'll be hell to pay for the lot of you cult-buggers.

27.speaker: Morghal
27.text: Now go on, sergeant's above. Can't miss her - just follow the screams.

22.speaker: Player
22.text: You must be joking. I am not giving you a single coin.

5.speaker: Player
5.text: Such insolence. I should take your head for this.

23.context: CinematicNodeContext: Morghal grins evilly and brandishes a blade - then smiles and puts her blade back.

33.speaker: Morghal
33.text: Unclog your hole - just shitting around.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: I'm here to see the sergeant. I have her boots.

18.speaker: Corsair Greymon
18.text: Aye, that they do. Found the hoon sailing Gekh's skiff.

2.speaker: Morghal
2.text: Clan's on edge - as like to tear a stranger right up.

8.speaker: Morghal
8.text: You want in? Pay the toll. You'll slip through like a dagger through dung.

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I was told to report to the sergeant. I have not come to work.

30.speaker: Player
30.text: My reasons for coming are private. Now step aside.

38.speaker: Corsair Greymon
38.text: Aye. They sniffed up Gekh's corpse. Found the hoon sailing his skiff.

41.speaker: Corsair Greymon
41.text: Aye. One of those Absolute crackpots. Found the hoon sailing Gekh's skiff.

11.speaker: Morghal
11.text: Been wanting a reason to choke the life out of you, shit-for-brains.
11.context: NodeContext: Low rage, about to fight.

35.speaker: Player
35.text: My business is my own. No need to concern yourself with it.
